name: Robin (itch) (mahalis)
description:
An unfinished game about a piggy bank robbing a real bank. Come for the visuals, stay for the fact that nothing in the game can hurt you because I didn't finish that part.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click/hold to shoot individual coins quickly
  • Right click/hold to shoot several coins slowly

Get to the white door at the end of the level to progress to the next one. Enjoy!
